name: All-Star Basketball - Score with Super Power-Ups
name_original: All-Star Basketball - Score with Super Power-Ups
description:
The best online Basketball game on your Android with game changing power-ups!

Shoot hoops, earn gold and customize your pro basketball player! Travel around the world and dominate the court in ALL-STAR BASKETBALL.

Play online against real human basketball rivals including those on other mobile platforms. Dominate the competition with your shooting skills & accuracy. Drop dimes and nail the swoosh shot all day long. Boost your score and light the ball on fire for big points in REAL-TIME!

AMAZING 3D GRAPHICS
The best looking basketball game on mobile with player models and unique 3D environments created by a artist from AAA video games. Console quality graphics in the palm of your hand!

ONLINE PVP
Play online against others in real-time. We don’t use bots. When you connect, it’s to another live player on an Android or Apple device! Can you handle the pressure and come out on top in a fast paced shootout?

CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAYER
Gear up like a basketball star! Tons of customizable items for thousands of possible combinations. Win gold, unlock swag and new balls to show your personal baller style. Unlock power-ups to boost your score & stack them for insane point combinations!

TRAVEL THE WORLD
Use your gold to unlock new basketball courts around the world. Exotic locations from South East Asia to the world famous Holcombe Rucker Park in New York City where some of the most famous NBA pros developed their basketball skills.

FEATURING
• Real time online PVP (Player vs Player)
• Console quality 3D graphics
• Score boosting, stackable basket ball power ups
• Multiple game modes to unlock
• Tons of gear to customize your pro basketball player
• Play without internet or WiFi

*All-Star Basketball - PLAY NOW!*


____________________

For more information, go to facebook.com/maketheshot or follow us on twitter @renownent

* This is the full version of the game and it can be played for free without making any IAPs
**Online Versus requires a WiFi connection for best performance
